text: Marcgraviastrum gigantophyllum is a species of plant in the Marcgraviaceae family. It is endemic to Ecuador. The vine's natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane areas of the Andes Ecuadorian ranges. ==References== * gigantophyllum Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Flora of the Andes Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Marcgraviastrum gigantophyllum
